overview:
Toxie is a superior entertainment website, it has many partners and has big plans for the future.

Toxie empowers users worldwide to join together and have fun, Toxie has many exiting features that will astonish you! We add loads of pages and features every day so you never get bored of seeing our colourful website! .

When Toxie was know as Wixie we didnâ€™t really know what to do with the website, and we where really struggling to gather visitors to the website, so we closed down, but now we have new ideas and ways to improve our visitor problem. We are going to run more ad campaigns and spread the work of Toxie to the world! And guess what! You can help us! Send a email or message to all of you friends telling them to visit our spectacular website. Use this link www.toxieuk.co.cc.

Thank you!
